title: Komsu Kafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Italian, Western
description: A collective coffee place, where you can eat in-house-made vegetarian and vegan food, drink fair trade coffee with a list of recommended prices but you can give as much as you want or have. You can even bring your own food and cook in the kitchen. An open-minded community space welcomes everyone.
